name: 劉勇宏
objective:

The Course is divided into five units: 1). The Nineteenth Century: The Industrial Revolution was the major influence on architectural history development. Structures of this period were marvels of engineering using materials like iron, plate glass, and reinforced concrete in new types of construction. 2).
